# videoGravity

**Instance Property**

A value that indicates how the layer displays video content within its bounds.

## Declaration

```swift
var videoGravity: AVLayerVideoGravity { get set }
```

## Discussion

Options are [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVLayerVideoGravity/resizeAspect], [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVLayerVideoGravity/resizeAspectFill], and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVLayerVideoGravity/resize]. The default is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVLayerVideoGravity/resizeAspect].

This property is animatable.

## Layer configuration

- **isPreviewing**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the layer is rendering video frames from its source.
